content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Max Müller. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure we can come to an agreement on the rental price for this lovely apartment. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Herr Heine. I'm looking for a fair price, considering the size of the apartment and its location. Would you be willing to start at a lower rate?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Max. I'm open to negotiations. How much lower would you like to start?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Herr Heine. I was thinking we could start at around 800 Euros per month. Does that seem reasonable to you?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 800 Euros per month is a good starting point, Max. I'm interested in what you have to say. Would you be willing to go higher if necessary?
name: Heinrich Heine
